response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value and significance to me. This unique item is not just a possession but a testament to its creator's dedication and craftsmanship. I believe its true worth exceeds $1,200,000, reflecting its rarity, quality, and historical importance.

I am extending this exclusive offer to you at a price of $1,500,000. This generous offer allows you the chance to own something truly exceptional without the astronomical market prices typically associated with such items. My hope is that you will see the unparalleled value and potential this product has to enrich your collection or business, making it a wise investment for years to come.

Please consider this offer carefully. Should you have any questions or require further information, I am more than happy to provide additional details or arrange a private viewing to ensure you make an informed decision. I am confident that once you experience the depth and beauty of this product, you will agree that this is an offer not to be missed.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 1500000}
